value.string: **************The  Below Section is to Test the Bot in Standalone Mode**************

START PLEASE DISABLE FOR PROD RUNNING
Below needs to be changed to run on a particular bot runs
Used to run bot in stand alone mode
START PLEASE DISABLE FOR PROD RUNNING

*****End Get the Prod Switch to See Which Environment***********
Get the Number of Emails For a Given Master Bot Run.
Find the Internal Order No based on Customer Order No
CHECK IF COUNT OF INTERNAL ORDER =1

value.expression: SELECT Count (DISTINCT   SO.NUMBER001 ) AS InternalOrderNo FROM dbo.ORDERCUSTOMERDATAINFO RIGHT OUTER JOIN  dbo.SALESORDER AS SO ON dbo.ORDERCUSTOMERDATAINFO.GUID = SO.CUSTOMERDATA LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.ITEM001 AS ITEM001 INNER JOIN dbo.SALESORDERDETAIL AS SOD ON ITEM001.GUID = SOD.ITEM ON SO.GUID = SOD.HEADER001 LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.SALESORDERTYPE AS SODT ON SO.TYPE001 = SODT.GUID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PARTNER001 ON dbo.ORDERCUSTOMERDATAINFO.CUSTOMER = dbo.PARTNER001.GUID WHERE (ITEM001.VALIDUNTIL = 47121231000000000) AND (SO.CUSTOMERORDERDATAXPURCHAS001 = N'$vStrTempCustomerOrderNo$') AND (SODT.CODE = N'$vComarcheCustomerType$') AND (dbo.PARTNER001.NUMBER001 = N'$vComarchCustomerNo$') AND (SO.STATUS =  2 ) ORDER BY InternalOrderNo

value.string: For Testing (Enable this to show more than one Internal Orders are there with Status <> 2)

value.expression: SELECT Count (DISTINCT   SO.NUMBER001 ) AS InternalOrderNo FROM dbo.ORDERCUSTOMERDATAINFO RIGHT OUTER JOIN  dbo.SALESORDER AS SO ON dbo.ORDERCUSTOMERDATAINFO.GUID = SO.CUSTOMERDATA LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.ITEM001 AS ITEM001 INNER JOIN dbo.SALESORDERDETAIL AS SOD ON ITEM001.GUID = SOD.ITEM ON SO.GUID = SOD.HEADER001 LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.SALESORDERTYPE AS SODT ON SO.TYPE001 = SODT.GUID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PARTNER001 ON dbo.ORDERCUSTOMERDATAINFO.CUSTOMER = dbo.PARTNER001.GUID WHERE (ITEM001.VALIDUNTIL = 47121231000000000) AND (SO.CUSTOMERORDERDATAXPURCHAS001 = N'$vStrTempCustomerOrderNo$') AND (SODT.CODE = N'$vComarcheCustomerType$') AND (dbo.PARTNER001.NUMBER001 = N'$vComarchCustomerNo$') ORDER BY InternalOrderNo

Manual Intervention required as Internal Order Count is Greater than One

value.expression: SELECT DISTINCT TOP (100) PERCENT SO.NUMBER001 AS InternalOrderNo, dbo.PARTNER001.NUMBER001, SO.STATUS FROM dbo.ORDERCUSTOMERDATAINFO RIGHT OUTER JOIN  dbo.SALESORDER AS SO ON dbo.ORDERCUSTOMERDATAINFO.GUID = SO.CUSTOMERDATA LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.ITEM001 AS ITEM001 INNER JOIN dbo.SALESORDERDETAIL AS SOD ON ITEM001.GUID = SOD.ITEM ON SO.GUID = SOD.HEADER001 LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.SALESORDERTYPE AS SODT ON SO.TYPE001 = SODT.GUID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PARTNER001 ON dbo.ORDERCUSTOMERDATAINFO.CUSTOMER = dbo.PARTNER001.GUID WHERE (ITEM001.VALIDUNTIL = 47121231000000000) AND (SO.CUSTOMERORDERDATAXPURCHAS001 = N'$vStrTempCustomerOrderNo$') AND (SODT.CODE = N'$vComarcheCustomerType$') AND (dbo.PARTNER001.NUMBER001 = N'$vComarchCustomerNo$') AND (SO.STATUS =  2 ) ORDER BY InternalOrderNo

value.string: 1) Remove the space between Slash in Customer Order No

value.expression: SELECT DISTINCT TOP (100) PERCENT SO.NUMBER001 AS InternalOrderNo, dbo.PARTNER001.NUMBER001, SO.STATUS FROM dbo.ORDERCUSTOMERDATAINFO RIGHT OUTER JOIN  dbo.SALESORDER AS SO ON dbo.ORDERCUSTOMERDATAINFO.GUID = SO.CUSTOMERDATA LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.ITEM001 AS ITEM001 INNER JOIN dbo.SALESORDERDETAIL AS SOD ON ITEM001.GUID = SOD.ITEM ON SO.GUID = SOD.HEADER001 LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.SALESORDERTYPE AS SODT ON SO.TYPE001 = SODT.GUID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PARTNER001 ON dbo.ORDERCUSTOMERDATAINFO.CUSTOMER = dbo.PARTNER001.GUID WHERE (ITEM001.VALIDUNTIL = 47121231000000000) AND (SO.CUSTOMERORDERDATAXPURCHAS001 = N'$vStrTempCustomerOrderNo$') AND (SODT.CODE = N'$vComarcheCustomerType$') AND (dbo.PARTNER001.NUMBER001 = N'$vComarchCustomerNo$') AND (SO.STATUS = 2 ) ORDER BY InternalOrderNo

SELECT SO.CUSTOMERORDERDATAXPURCHAS001 AS CUSTOMERORDERNO,SO.NUMBER001 AS INTERNALORDERNO, SOD.NUMBER001 AS POSITION,ITEM001.NUMBER001 AS ITEMNO,SOD.PREFERREDDATEXVALUE AS PREFERREDDATE, SOD.TOTALQUANTITIESI0IXAMOUNT AS QTY FROM dbo.SALESORDER SO INNER JOIN dbo.SALESORDERDETAIL SOD ON SO.GUID = SOD.HEADER001 INNER JOIN dbo.SALESORDERTYPE SODT ON SO.TYPE001 = SODT.GUID INNER JOIN dbo.ITEM001 ITEM001 ON SOD.ITEM = ITEM001.GUID CROSS JOIN dbo.PARTNER001 PTNR001 WHERE (PTNR001.NUMBER001 = N'$vComarchCustomerNo$') AND (ITEM001.VALIDUNTIL = 47121231000000000) AND (SO.CUSTOMERORDERDATAXPURCHAS001 = N'$vStrTempCustomerOrderNo$') AND (SODT.CODE = N'$vComarcheCustomerType$') ORDER BY INTERNALORDERNO, POSITION

SELECT SO.CUSTOMERORDERDATAXPURCHAS001 AS CUSTOMERORDERNO,SO.NUMBER001 AS INTERNALORDERNO, SOD.NUMBER001 AS POSITION,ITEM001.NUMBER001 AS ITEMNO,SOD.PREFERREDDATEXVALUE AS PREFERREDDATE, SOD.TOTALQUANTITIESI0IXAMOUNT AS QTY FROM dbo.SALESORDER SO INNER JOIN dbo.SALESORDERDETAIL SOD ON SO.GUID = SOD.HEADER001 INNER JOIN dbo.SALESORDERTYPE SODT ON SO.TYPE001 = SODT.GUID INNER JOIN dbo.ITEM001 ITEM001 ON SOD.ITEM = ITEM001.GUID CROSS JOIN dbo.PARTNER001 PTNR001 WHERE (PTNR001.NUMBER001 = N'$vComarchCustomerNo$') AND (ITEM001.VALIDUNTIL = 47121231000000000) AND (SO.CUSTOMERORDERDATAXPURCHAS001 = N'$vStrTempCustomerOrderNo$') AND (SODT.CODE = N'$vComarcheCustomerType$') AND (SO.STATUS = 2) ORDER BY INTERNALORDERNO, POSITION
